entry.title: First Birthday Weekend
entry.summary:
My daughter's first birthday was this weekend. We spent Saturday at Pomponio State Beach and went to a pumpkin seller on Sunday. Lovely fun.

View on Flickr

entry.title: Pacifica II
entry.summary:
Another trip to Pacifica towards the end of the day. I had a bit of fun with a polarizing filter and HDR shots. Take a wild guess which shots those were. :)

entry.title: Muir Woods
entry.summary:
Finally made it to Muir Woods. A lovely place, even if entirely too busy. Also, my camera's battery ran out, so half of these were actually taken with my phone--which actually works pretty well.

View on Flickr
entry.content:

entry.title: Half Moon Bay II
entry.summary:
Back to Half Moon Bay. We didn't park on site, but given all the neat things we saw, I'm okay with this.

entry.title: San Andreas Lake
entry.summary:
Had an hour and change to walk along the San Andreas Lake outside of Burlingame. It's really interesting to live so close to one of the better known fault lines in the world. We'll have to go back again sometime.

View on Flickr
entry.content:
Had an hour and change to walk along the San Andreas Lake outside of Burlingame. It's really interesting to live so close to one of the better known fault lines in the world. We'll have to go back again sometime.
